title: Phase 1: Diagnostic
description: Structured assessment of workflows, coordination points, and automation opportunities. You get a written roadmap prioritizing what's worth fixing first.

title: Phase 2: Implementation
description: Roadmap items implemented incrementally. We redesign workflows before automating, so changes reduce friction instead of digitizing problems.

title: Phase 3: Ongoing Partnership
description: Structured engagement focused on adoption and refinement. We stay embedded to monitor performance, resolve friction, and ensure improvements stick.
